title: Authors and Citation
text: package maintainer. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Alsamman (2024). HaploTraitR: Calculation Haplotype Trait Relative. R package version 0.1.0, https://alsammanalsamman.github.io/HaploTraitR/, AlsammanAlsamman.github.io/HaploTraitR.
code: @Manual{,   title = {HaploTraitR: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative},   author = {Alsamman M. Alsamman},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, https://alsammanalsamman.github.io/HaploTraitR/},   url = {AlsammanAlsamman.github.io/HaploTraitR}, }

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
text: project performs haplotype analysis visualizes phenotypic data across multiple genetic/haplotype combinations understand association haplotypes (SNPs linked LD) variation traits.

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
text: Please install following R packages installing HaploTraitR package:
code: # Install required packages if not already installed install.packages(c("devtools", "Rcpp", "igraph", "ggplot2", "rstatix", "dplyr", "ggpubr", "reshape2", "gridExtra", "ggtext"))

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
code: # Install the HaploTraitR package from GitHub devtools::install_github("AlsammanAlsamman/HaploTraitR")

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
text: Haplotype File: Barley_50K_KNNimp.hmp.txt - Contains SNP genotype information. GWAS File: SignificantSNP_GWAS.csv - Contains significant SNPs identified GWAS study. Phenotype File: Pheno_ANN19.tsv - Contains phenotypic data traits interest.

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
text: Distance Threshold: 1,000,000 (clustering SNPs within 1Mb significant SNPs) Cluster Count Threshold: 5 (minimum number SNPs cluster) LD Threshold: 0.3 (minimum LD value consider two SNPs LD) Combination Frequency Threshold: 0.1 (minimum genotypes combination consider combination)

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
text: HaploTraitR package allows users customize various configuration settings. default settings can changed user: outfolder: NULL (Output folder results) dist_threshold: 1000000 (Distance threshold clustering SNPs within 1Mb) dist_cluster_count: 5 (Minimum number SNPs cluster) ld_threshold: 0.3 (Minimum LD value consider two SNPs LD) comb_freq_threshold: 0.1 (Minimum frequency genotypes combination) fdr_threshold: 0.05 (False discovery rate threshold multiple testing correction) fdr_method: "fdr" (Method FDR correction) t_test_threshold: 0.05 (Threshold t-test significance) t_test_method: "t.test" (Method t-test) rsid_col: "rsid" (Column name rsid GWAS file) pos_col: "pos" (Column name position GWAS file) chr_col: "chr" (Column name chromosome GWAS file) pval_col: "p" (Column name p-value GWAS file) fdr_col: "fdr" (Column name FDR GWAS file) phenotypename: "Phenotype" (Name phenotype) phenotypeunit: NULL (Unit phenotype) initialize default configuration, use initialize_config function: set get specific configuration values, use set_config get_config functions:
code: initialize_config() # Set a configuration value set_config(config = list(dist_threshold = 500000))  # Get a configuration value dist_threshold <- get_config("dist_threshold") print(dist_threshold)

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
code: library(HaploTraitR)  # Step 1: Create a unique output folder for results result_folder <- create_unique_result_folder(location = "sampleout") set_config(config = list(outfolder = result_folder))  # Step 2: Read Data Files gwasfile <- "sampledata/SignificantSNP_GWAS.tsv" hapfile <- "sampledata/Barley_50K_KNNimp.hmp.txt" phenofile <- "sampledata/Pheno_ANN19.tsv"  gwas <- readGWAS(gwasfile, sep = "\t") hapmap <- readHapmap(hapfile) pheno <- read.csv(phenofile, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")  # Step 3: Set phenotype information in the configuration set_config(config = list(phenotypename = "PH", phenotypeunit = "cm"))  # Step 4: Generate Boxplots for Genotype-Phenotype Distribution bxplts <- boxplot_genotype_phenotype(pheno, gwas, hapmap)  # Step 5: Cluster SNPs by Chromosome dist_clusters <- getDistClusters(gwas, hapmap)  # Step 6: Compute LD Matrices LDsInfo <- computeLDclusters(hapmap, dist_clusters)  # Step 7: Cluster LD Values and Convert to Haplotypes clusterLDs <- getLDclusters(LDsInfo) haplotypes <- HaploTraitR::convertLDclusters2Haps(hapmap, clusterLDs)  # Step 8: Get Sample Haplotypes and Save snpcombsample <- HaploTraitR::getHapCombSamples(haplotypes, hapmap)  # Step 9: Generate SNP Combination Tables SNPcombTables <- getSNPcombTables(snpcombsample, pheno)  # Step 10: Perform t-tests on SNP Combinations t_test_snpComp <- HaploTraitR::testSNPcombs(SNPcombTables)  # Step 11: Generate and Save Haplotype Combination Boxplots generateHapCombBoxPlots(SNPcombTables, t_test_snpComp)  # Step 12: Plot Haplotype Distribution lDplots <- plotLDForClusters(clusterLDs)  # Step 13: Plot LD Combination Matrix with LD LDCombs <- plotLDCombMatrix(clusterLDs, haplotypes, gwas)

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative

title: Calculation of Haplotype Trait Relative
text: README provides overview steps involved performing haplotype analysis using HaploTraitR package. detailed instructions, please refer tutorial.Rmd file included repository. project aims help researchers understand genetic basis phenotypic variation analyzing visualizing associations haplotypes traits.
